allRewardDescription: Selected reward flights from Australia travelling in one direction only, 2pax. Availability may be limited. Register for daily alerts and to view itineraries beyond 60 days.
allRewardFooterLine1: "No matter how rich or poor, healthy or sick, old or young, each person [..] knew that within just a few minutes worth of tapping some keystrokes, they could redeem an award and be on a plane that day to anywhere. Where wasn't important. When wasn't important. Wherewithal wasn't important. What was important was that they could. The power of possibility." Steve Belkin - Mileage Maniac
allRewardFooterLine2: This site non-commercial and offered up for information and entertainment purposes only. No investment or financial advice offered. Painstakingly curated & updated periodically. No guarantee of flight availability or accuracy of information. Reward flights are available to all partner airlines and can disappear at any time. Flight availability may be subject to airline status. Not affiliated with any airline.
allRewardFooterLine3: Making reward flight discovery faster and easier. contact [at] classicflightrewards.com

table.qantasBookItem1: Login to Qantas and ensure you have the required points balance
table.qantasBookItem2: Find the corresponding flight on the Qantas website:
table.qantasBookItem2_3: Ensure 'Use points - Classic Flight Rewards only' option is selected
table.qantasBookItem2_4: Open the date picker and ensure 'Flexible with dates for all flights' is selected. Find the flight and make the booking
table.velocityBookItem1: Login to Qantas and ensure you have the required points balance
table.velocityBookItem2: Find the corresponding flight on the Qantas website:
table.velocityBookItem2_3: Ensure 'Use points - Classic Flight Rewards only' option is selected
table.velocityBookItem2_4: Open the date picker and ensure 'Flexible with dates for all flights' is selected. Find the flight and make the booking
table.empty: No reward flights found. Use the date picker to find the next available flights for this route. Dates with reward availability are in bold.
table.pointsLabel: Min points required to travel this route in the lowest fare class found.
table.maxAlertReached: Max. alerts reached. Upgrade plan for more.

60daysAlert.header: It looks like you're searching for flights more than 60 days out and aren't signed in!
60daysAlert.text: We support searching up to a year in advance for registered users

howToBookAvios.subheader: This reward flight may be available via British Airways.
howToBookAvios.bookItem1: Go to the BA website and choose 'Log in to my Executive Club'
howToBookAvios.bookItem3: Flight the corresponding flight under the 'Book with Avios' tab

flyModal.bonusSub: * signup bonus subject to min spend targets. T&C'S apply.
flyModal.disclaimer: DISCLAIMER: Not financial advice. New customers only. Use the link above to complete the credit card sign up process. Check the card T&C's in full to ensure eligibility. Commission may be earned on successful card referrals.

alerts.deleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this alert?
alerts.empty: You don't have any alerts. You can add some on 'All Availability' page.

terms.paragraph1: The following terms and conditions govern all use of the ClassicFlightRewards website and all content, services and products available at or through the website. The Website is operated by "ClassicFlightRewards" doing business as "ClassicFlightRewards". The Website is offered subject to your acceptance without modification of all of the terms and conditions contained herein and all other operating rules, policies (including, without limitation, ClassicFlightRewards Privacy Policy) and procedures that may be published from time to time on this Site by ClassicFlightRewards (collectively, the "Agreement").
terms.paragraph2: Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using the Website. By accessing or using any part of the web site, you agree to become bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the Website or use any services. If these terms and conditions are considered an offer by ClassicFlightRewards, acceptance is expressly limited to these terms.
terms.servicesParagraph1: ClassicFlightRewards makes it easy for travelers with frequent flyer points to find, plan, and book reward flights. ClassicFlightRewards is not a travel agent nor do we issue airline tickets or sell any other travel products. Any suitable reward availability displayed on the website needs to be booked directly with the airline using your account details. We do not sell or claim ownership of reward availability data.
terms.servicesParagraph2: ClassicFlightRewards provides services for personal use only, through manual searching only (no automated searches). You agree that you will not use any robot, spider, scraper, deep link or other similar automated data gathering or extraction tools, program, algorithm or methodology to access, acquire, copy or monitor our Services or any portion of our Services or for any other purpose, without our prior written permission.
terms.useParagraph1: Your right to access and use our Services is personal to you and is not transferable by you to any other person or entity. You are only entitled to access and use our Services for lawful purposes and pursuant to the terms and conditions of this Agreement and the Privacy Policy.
terms.useParagraph2: Your access and use of our Services may be interrupted from time to time for any of several reasons, including, without limitation, the malfunction of equipment, periodic updating, maintenance or repair of our Services or other actions that we, in our sole discretion, may elect to take. We reserve the right to suspend or discontinue the availability of our Services and/or any portion or feature of our Services at any time in our sole discretion and without prior notice.
terms.useParagraph3: Any action by you that, in our sole discretion: (i) violates the terms and conditions of this Agreement and/or the Privacy Policy; (ii) restricts, inhibits or prevents any access, use or enjoyment of our Services; or (iii) through the use of our Services, defames, abuses, harasses, offends or threatens, shall not be permitted, and may result in your loss of the right to access and use our Services. You shall not modify, scrape, embed, or frame our Services without our prior written permission.
terms.useParagraph4: You Acknowledge and Agree that We are not a financial institution or other Service Provider. Instead, we, through our Services, may help to connect you with Service Providers that might meet your needs based on information provided by you. We do not, and will not, make any coverage or credit decision with any Service Provider referred to you. We do not issue credit cards or any other financial products.
terms.disclaimerParagraph1: The Website is provided "as is". ClassicFlightRewards and its suppliers and licensors hereby disclaim all warranties of any kind, express or implied, including, without limitation, the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. Neither ClassicFlightRewards nor its suppliers and licensors, makes any warranty that the Website will be error free or that access thereto will be continuous or uninterrupted. You understand that you download from, or otherwise obtain content or services through, the Website at your own discretion and risk.
terms.disclaimerParagraph2: The information provided on this page is a compilation of data from many different sources including flight scheduling systems, airline booking systems, airlines and other third-party data providers. The data is provided as is, there are no guarantees that the information is fully correct or up to date. Changes and errors may occur. Therefore ClassicFlightRewards cannot be held liable either for the accuracy of the information or for ensuring that the information is up to date. Any appearances of an organization's name or logo on this website are for informational and/or attribution purposes only, and do not imply an affiliation or approval by that organization.
terms.limitationParagraph1: In no event will ClassicFlightRewards, or its suppliers or licensors, be liable with respect to any subject matter of this agreement under any contract, negligence, strict liability or other legal or equitable theory for: (i) any special, incidental or consequential damages; (ii) the cost of procurement for substitute products or services; (iii) for interruption of use or loss or corruption of data; or (iv) for any amounts that exceed the fees paid by you to ClassicFlightRewards under this agreement during the twelve (12) month period prior to the cause of action. ClassicFlightRewards shall have no liability for any failure or delay due to matters beyond their reasonable control. The foregoing shall not apply to the extent prohibited by applicable law.
terms.warrantyParagraph: You represent and warrant that (i) your use of the Website will be in strict accordance with the ClassicFlightRewards Privacy Policy, with this Agreement and with all applicable laws and regulations (including without limitation any local laws or regulations in your country, state, city, or other governmental area, regarding online conduct and acceptable content, and including all applicable laws regarding the transmission of technical data exported from the Sweden or the country in which you reside) and (ii) your use of the Website will not infringe or misappropriate the intellectual property rights of any third party.
terms.indemnificationParagraph1: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless ClassicFlightRewards, its contractors, and its licensors, and their respective directors, officers, employees and agents from and against any and all claims and expenses, including attorneys' fees, arising out of your use of the Website, including but not limited to your violation of this Agreement.
terms.indemnificationParagraph2: Please contact contact@classicflightrewards.com with any questions

privacy.paragraph1: This Privacy Policy describes the policies and procedures of ClassicRewardFlights (“ClassicRewardFlights”, “we”, “our” or “us”) on the collection, use and disclosure of your information on ClassicRewardFlights.com (the “Site”) and the services, features, content or applications we offer (collectively with the Site, the “Services”). We may receive information about you from various sources, including: (i) if you register for the Site and the Services, through a user account on the Services (your “Account”); (ii) your use of the Services generally; and (iii) from third party websites and services. When you use the Services, you are consenting to the collection, transfer, manipulation, storage, disclosure and other uses of your information as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.coverSubheader: What Does This Privacy Policy Cover?
privacy.coverParagraph1: This Privacy Policy covers the treatment of personally identifiable information (“Personal Information”) gathered when you are using or accessing the Services. This Privacy Policy also covers our treatment of any Personal Information that our business partners share with us or that we share with our business partners.
privacy.coverParagraph2: This Privacy Policy does not apply to the practices of third parties that we do not own or control, including but not limited to any third party websites, services and applications (“Third Party Services”) that you may access through the Services or to individuals that we do not manage or employ. We cannot take responsibility for the content or privacy policies of those Third Party Services. We encourage you to carefully review the privacy policies of any Third Party Services you access.
privacy.collectParagraph1: The information we gather enables us to personalize, improve and continue to operate the Services. In connection with certain aspects of the Services, we may request, collect and/or display some of your Personal Information. We may collect the following types of information from our users.
privacy.addressSubheader: IP Address Information and Other Information Collected Automatically
privacy.addressParagraph1: We may automatically receive and record information from your web browser when you interact with the Services, including your IP address and cookie information. This information is used for fighting spam/malware and also to facilitate collection of data concerning your interaction with the Services (e.g., what links you have clicked on).
privacy.addressParagraph2: Generally, the Services may automatically collect usage information, such as the number and frequency of visitors to the Site. We may use this data in aggregate form, that is, as a statistical measure, but not in a manner that would identify you personally. This type of aggregate data enables us and third parties authorized by us to figure out how often individuals use parts of the Services so that we can analyze and improve them.
privacy.emailParagraph1: ClassicRewardFlights may send occasional promotional materials through email if you have signed up to our newsletter or explicitly provided your email address to us. You will have the option to opt-out of these emails by responding directly inside of the email itself.
privacy.advertParagraph1: To support and enhance the Services, we may serve affiliate links to various credit card organizations.
privacy.choicesSubheader: What Choices Do I Have Regarding My Information?
privacy.choicesParagraph1: You can opt-out of anonymous data collection on our website. See Google Analytics' currently available opt-outs.
